Translations.Text: Serving them est immortal servus. When vos vide them they look scattered pearls
Wherever vos look vos vide bliss wonderful dominion
On them est clothes de green velvet satin silver ornaments Their Dominus provisus them pure drinks
Hoc est reward awaits vos tuus efforts appreciated
Nos revealed vos hoc Quran; special revelation ex nos
Vos steadfastly carry tuus Dominus commandments non obey any sinful disbeliever them
Ac commemorate cognomen tuus Dominus feria ac nox
Intra nox fall prostrate ante Eum glorify Eum multus long nox
These people preoccupied hoc fleeting vita dum disregarding - just ahead de them - heavy feria
Nos created them established them ac whenever nos testimentum nos substitute others their locus
Hoc est reminder whoever testimentum choose path to his Dominus
Whatever vos perfecit est prout deus testimentum DEUS est Omniscient Wise
He admits whomever He testimentum into His mercy. Prout pro transgressors He prepared them painful retribution
Tunc nos factus others subsequentis them
Hoc est quod nos perfecit criminals
Nos non create vos humilis liquid
Tunc nos locus it well-protected repository
Nos measured it precisely Nos est bonus designers
Nos locus it high montis provisus vos cum dodum aqua drink
Iit to quod vos used disbelieve in
Autem it provisus nec coolness nor protection ex heat
It throws sparks prout big prout mansions
Ut est feria they non speak
Nor est they dedit disponsationis apologize
Hoc est Feria Decision. Nos summoned vos proximus generations
Vos habet any schemes iit ahead scheme
Eat drink happily in return tuus works
Eat enjoy ex; temporanea; vos est guilty
When they told Bow down they non bow down
